name: Protected
description:
You find yourself trapped in the bottom of a pit. The only way to escape is to go in to the darkness, to flee from your doubts and maybe you can escape, this time. But why do you want to leave when you can stay here with me!

This game was made for The Tenth Creative Games Jam by IamNOTaCAT

Ending melody, Montmartre - Harp was recorded by soundlandscapes
